mapper.insert: insert into nkg.item(id, ver, `drop`, tableId, title, name, division, comment) values (#{id}, #{ver},#{drop},#{tableId}, #{title}, #{name}, #{division}, #{comment})
mapper.select: select t2.id id, tableId, title, name, division, comment from ( (select max(ver) ver,id from (select id, ver from nkg.item where ver <= #{ver} and (title like '%${keywords}%' or name like '%${keywords}%') ) t1 group by id) t2 join nkg.item t3 on t3.ver = t2.ver and t3.id = t2.id) where `drop`='0'
